descriptionHtml:
Ever found the random enchanted weapon you got when becoming a Thane was lackluster and nothing special to remember?
Then look no further.
In this resource i'll be posting unique meshes (for which a friend of mine will hopefully provide textures) that serve as a base for unique weapons that replace the random enchanted hold weapon.

Done:
Axe of Whiterunn
Sword of Falkreath
Dagger of Riften
Axe-Pick of Dawnstar

The files were made in Blender 2.69.
Resource is available to everyone as long as i get credit for the meshes.
author: BoredManMarc
